message: I understand you want a larger share, but this split is more in line with the decreasing value of the money.
Considering inflation, I'll offer a bit more
Alice, we're running out of time and the money is losing value fast. This offer gives us both a decent share considering the circumstances.
Let's find a middle ground considering the inflation
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The money is losing value with every passing round. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution at this point.
